name: Melody Of The Deep
description:
This is a kind of vertical slice of my Master project. This is a 2D platformer & puzzle game programmed in C# on Unity.

In this game you're playing Noo'ä. She's mastering 4 elements which have 3 powers each : 1 passive, 1 active & 1 "ultimate". 

In your first step you will encounter "rooms" that will allow you to test your power to see what you can do with them.

You need an Xbox controller to play it correctly.

There are probably still some bugs left but none that will block you. But also nothing tell you that you've finished.
